GSD.product_version: versions from v4.13 to before v5.18.13
GSD.description:
sysctl: Fix data races in proc_douintvec_minmax().

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.13 by commit b60eddf98b9716651069dfda296c91311a7a6293, it was introduced in version v4.13 by commit 61d9b56a89208d8cccd0b4cfec7e6959717e16e3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: sysctl: Fix data races in proc_douintvec_minmax().
